books.title: Bees
books.author: Piotr Socha
books.description: One part science, one part cultural history, and countless parts fascination, Bees celebrates the important role that these intriguing insects have played in our ecosystem throughout the ages...

books.title: Trees
books.author: Piotr Socha, Wojciech Grajkowski
books.description: Part botany, part history, part cultural anthropology--Trees goes beyond the basics...

books.title: Carl's Snowy Afternoon
books.author: Alexandra Day
books.description: Carl and Madeleine have plans of their own--they want to play in the snow...
books.learnings: Exploring nature and the world around us.

books.title: Precious Moments: Little Book of Prayers
books.author: Jean Fischer
books.description: Inspire little ones to pray! This colorful board book teaches little ones, ages 2-4, prayers for thankfulness, praise, school, mealtime, and bedtime...

books.title: Monsters at Christmas
books.author: Zanna Davidson
books.description: It's nearly Christmas and Billy and Ruby are feeling VERY excited...

books.title: One Little Raindrop: Life Cycles
books.author: Lesley Sims
books.recommendation: Best read together with a parent.
books.learnings: Exploring nature and the world around us.

books.title: There’s a Bunny in Your Book
books.author: Tom Fletcher
books.description: It's a fluffy bunny, and she's VERY hungry... but those carrots are not for bunnies!

books.title: Frida the Rock-and-Roll Moth
books.author: Kim Hillyard , Kim Hillyard (Illustrator)
books.description: Frida is a musical moth who loves to rock out ­– but starts to doubt herself when others join in...

books.title: Gretel the Wonder Mammoth
books.author: Kim Hillyard , Kim Hillyard (Illustrator)
books.description: Gretel the last mammoth feels overwhelmed in her new life... a story of asking for help.
